name: places/ChIJI7zgiAhZwokR_AfFVAzmqcs
formattedAddress: 124 Ridge St, New York, NY 10002, USA
adrFormatAddress: 124 Ridge St, New York, NY 10002, USA

originalText.text:
Every time I visit Love, Dunette I have had an amazing experience. From the moment I walked in, I was greeted by the friendly staff and amazing puppy and immediately felt welcomed. My hairstylist, Christine was attentive and listened to exactly what I wanted. She provided suggestions and helped me choose the perfect color and cut for my hair. Her technique was so impressive and nothing I have ever experienced before!

During the service, I was offered complimentary beverage- which made my nerves about cutting my hair that much easier. The salon atmosphere was clean, calming, and had a great vibe. It was clear that the staff takes great pride in their work and truly cares about their clients' satisfaction.

After the service, I was thrilled with the end result. My hair looked and felt amazing and I received many compliments from friends and family. Overall, I highly recommend Love, Dunette Salon to anyone looking for a premium salon experience and excellent service.

originalText.text: SIMPLY THE BEST! Not only is the vibe warm and welcoming here, but all the stylists and patrons are super nice. The salon is just simply a happy place for everyone. Christine has been cutting my hair for almost two years, she has shepherded my hair from an awkward lob (from a previous salon) into the long, luscious cut of my dreams. Christine is so easy to talk to and communicate with. I always leave the salon with a smile on my face and really look forward to my appointments. Her prices are very reasonable, especially considering the value of the cuts and the time she dedicates solely to my hair, she never double books or rushes a cut, and I always feel really taken care of in her chair. Cannot recommend Love, Dunette enough!

originalText.text: Finally found THE salon. Christine is amazing. She’s warm and friendly and she really listened to all my concerns. She takes her time with you so you never feel rushed. She cut my wavy hair so meticulously and gave me gorgeous blonde highlights that have grown out so natural and low maintenance. The salon is so chill and cozy. Just amazing vibes with the whole experience. Can not wait to go back!

text.text: Finally found THE salon. Christine is amazing. She’s warm and friendly and she really listened to all my concerns. She takes her time with you so you never feel rushed. She cut my wavy hair so meticulously and gave me gorgeous blonde highlights that have grown out so natural and low maintenance. The salon is so chill and cozy. Just amazing vibes with the whole experience. Can not wait to go back!

originalText.text:
I cannot rave enough about Love, Dunette! From the moment I walked in, I felt at ease in the relaxed and fun atmosphere. The cherry on top? A shop dog, named Hattie! The pup greets everyone with wagging tail and friendly sniffs, and I knew I was in for a treat.

But let's talk about the real stars of the show: the stylists. Christine, my go-to girl, is an absolute master of balayage. Every time I leave the salon, I feel like a brand new person. She listens to my ideas and offers suggestions based on her expertise, and the results are always stunning.

But even if you don't book an appointment with Christine, you're in good hands. Every stylist at this salon is talented and welcoming. They all have unique styles and specialties, and they work together seamlessly to create a warm and inviting atmosphere.

I've been to plenty of hair salons over the years, but this one truly stands out. Whether you're looking for a quick trim or a dramatic transformation, you'll leave feeling beautiful and refreshed. And who knows? You might just make a furry new friend while you're there!

Overall, I would highly recommend this salon to anyone looking for a fun and relaxed atmosphere, talented stylists, and a shop dog to cuddle with. Trust me, you won't regret it!

originalText.text: This review is so long overdue! I’ve been coming to Love, Dunette since they opened. Since going to Christine, long gone is the angst I used to feel before getting a cut or color. Not only wildly talented, she makes you feel completely at ease. The space & energy naturally make you feel comfortable as well.  We’ve gone from ombré, blonde (gradually & with care - no breakage), brunette, highlights, long & short hair since 2017!  My hair/therapist magic creator is truly the best :). Highly recommend!!  Honestly, the entire team & experience is one of a kind! Just love them. Book your appt!
